ygData.subject: About the items...
ygData.msgSnippet: A few days back on the Tarew Marr server, GMs did a dynamic quest in Steamfont (Meldrath invasion).  I wasn t on at the time of the event, but I learned about
ygData.messageBody:
A few days back on the Tarew Marr server, GMs did a dynamic quest in
Steamfont (Meldrath invasion). I wasn't on at the time of the event, but I
learned about it later when I logged on and got a tell about it and that
one of the items found in the loot was a collapsible fishing pole. I was
given the pole, and from it I was able to make the spyglass (re-read my
original message to the list...) Yes, that spyglass formula on the site is
correct :P I put up a fairly quick update to the site with the screenshots
and such. On the main page news - 'Another update soon'

I don't know the formula for the fishing pole, in case you haven't guessed
it yet. Should I have mentioned this sooner? A bad oversight in getting
some info up on two items, which for a tough-to-find-anything skill like
tinkering, is great news. Still, I was rather disappointed at some of the
comments I received... Anyone remember the old saying for when people
ASSUME? :P

The items exist in the game. We don't know the formula for the fishing
pole, however. In that case, why not start a project to find it. I'll
start (which I was intending to do aka the update...) creating a list of
all the combinations that people try on the site. Through that we should
be able to find it, right? I see no reason why not. For those hesitant
about spending the cash, think of it as an investment 8)

Awaiting feedback...

-Luke
Tinkering Guide website:
http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering
Last updated: 8-8-99
